Uses of Package
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service

  • Packages that use com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service 
    Package Description
    com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller
    This package contains classes which respond to incoming HTTP requests patterns.
    com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.security
    This package contains configuration classes related to security.
    com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service
    This package contains classes which performs critical and major operations.
  • Classes in com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service used by com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller 
    Class and Description
    CategoryService
    This class deals with operations related to news article categories.
    HeadlineService
    This class deals with headline news articles
    ProfileService
    This class is used to perform profile related activities.
    SearchService
    This class is used to form search operations.
    SignupService
    This class is used to perform signup activities.
  • Classes in com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service used by com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.security 
    Class and Description
    OAuth2UserServiceImpl
    This class performs OAuth2 authorization.
    OidcUserServiceImpl
    This class performs OpenID Connect 1.0 authorization.
    UserDetailsServiceImpl
    This class is an implementation of UserDetailsService.
  • Classes in com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service used by com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service 
    Class and Description
    CustomizedNewsService
    This class is used to fetch articles of categories the user is subscribed to.
    Since the news map is huge, and it requires a lot of computation power to filter articles of categories the user is subscribed and put it in a list on every request,
    the scope of the class is set to session, meaning this bean will be created for every new session.
    HeadlineService
    This class deals with headline news articles
    NewsService
    This is the main class which fetches the news articles from the api.
    SearchService
    This class is used to form search operations.
    SessionBeanService
    This class acts as a session listener.
    ThreadPoolService
    This class is used as a thread pool to create Thread instances and keep track of them while they are alive.
